languages.text: "Говорила же, что она будет в шоке, хех! Аж искры из глаз от удивления пошли". {n}Самодовольный оскал Идиры сменяется озабоченностью.{/n} "Правда, дружки мои из-за дверки все никак не уймутся, гогочут ехидно, будто не над ней злую шутку сыграли, а над нами".

traits.locale_text: "Говорила же, что она будет в шоке, хех! Аж искры из глаз от удивления пошли". {n}Самодовольный оскал Идиры сменяется озабоченностью.{/n} "Правда, дружки мои из-за дверки все никак не уймутся, гогочут ехидно, будто не над ней злую шутку сыграли, а над нами".

languages.text: "I said it would come as a shock to her, didn't I? Her eyes literally sparkled with astonishment." {n}Idira's smug grin gives way to an expression of concern.{/n} "That said, my friends from behind the door won't calm down. They keep sneering and guffawing as if the joke's on us and not her."
languages.original_text: "Говорила же, что она будет в шоке, хех! Аж искры из глаз от удивления пошли". {n}Самодовольный оскал Идиры сменяется озабоченностью.{/n} "Правда, дружки мои из-за дверки все никак не уймутся, гогочут ехидно, будто не над ней злую шутку сыграли, а над нами".

Her eyes literally sparkled with astonishment." {n}Idira's smug grin gives way to an expression of concern.{/n} "That said, my friends from behind the door won't calm down. They keep sneering and guffawing as if the joke's on us and not her."

"I said it would come as a shock to her, didn't I? Her eyes literally sparkled with astonishment." {n}Idira's smug grin gives way to an expression of concern.{/n} "That said, my friends from behind the door won't calm down. They keep sneering and guffawing as if the joke's on us and not her."

languages.text: "Ich sagte doch, sie würde sehr überrascht sein, oder nicht? Ihre Augen haben vor Erstaunen buchstäblich gefunkelt." {n}Idiras hochmütiges Grinsen weicht einem Ausdruck der Sorge.{/n} "Aber meine Freunde von jenseits der Tür beruhigen sich gar nicht mehr. Sie lachen und höhnen, als würde der Witz nicht auf ihre Kosten gehen, sondern auf unsere."
languages.original_text: "I said it would come as a shock to her, didn't I? Her eyes literally sparkled with astonishment." {n}Idira's smug grin gives way to an expression of concern.{/n} "That said, my friends from behind the door won't calm down. They keep sneering and guffawing as if the joke's on us and not her."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sagte doch, sie würde sehr überrascht sein, oder nicht? Ihre Augen haben vor Erstaunen buchstäblich gefunkelt." {n}Idiras hochmütiges Grinsen weicht einem Ausdruck der Sorge.{/n} "Aber meine Freunde von jenseits der Tür beruhigen sich gar nicht mehr. Sie lachen und höhnen, als würde der Witz nicht auf ihre Kosten gehen, sondern auf unsere."

languages.text: « J'avais bien dit que ça lui ferait un choc, pas vrai ? Ses yeux étincelaient littéralement de stupeur... » {n}Le sourire goguenard d'Idira se mue en une moue inquiète.{/n} « Cela étant, mes amis de l'autre côté de la porte ne semblent pas vouloir se calmer. Ils continuent leurs jérémiades, comme si c'était nous, le dindon de la farce, et pas elle... »
languages.original_text: "I said it would come as a shock to her, didn't I? Her eyes literally sparkled with astonishment." {n}Idira's smug grin gives way to an expression of concern.{/n} "That said, my friends from behind the door won't calm down. They keep sneering and guffawing as if the joke's on us and not her."

traits.locale_text: « J'avais bien dit que ça lui ferait un choc, pas vrai ? Ses yeux étincelaient littéralement de stupeur... » {n}Le sourire goguenard d'Idira se mue en une moue inquiète.{/n} « Cela étant, mes amis de l'autre côté de la porte ne semblent pas vouloir se calmer. Ils continuent leurs jérémiades, comme si c'était nous, le dindon de la farce, et pas elle... »

languages.text: “我早就说过她会大吃一惊的，不是吗？到最后，她的目光看起来确实相当震惊。”{n}伊迪拉自鸣得意地笑了起来，但随后，她的表情变得忧虑起来。{/n}“话虽如此，可我在门后的那些朋友并没有安静下来。他们笑个不停，好像他们看的笑话不是她，而是我们。”
languages.original_text: "I said it would come as a shock to her, didn't I? Her eyes literally sparkled with astonishment." {n}Idira's smug grin gives way to an expression of concern.{/n} "That said, my friends from behind the door won't calm down. They keep sneering and guffawing as if the joke's on us and not her."

traits.locale_text: “我早就说过她会大吃一惊的，不是吗？到最后，她的目光看起来确实相当震惊。”{n}伊迪拉自鸣得意地笑了起来，但随后，她的表情变得忧虑起来。{/n}“话虽如此，可我在门后的那些朋友并没有安静下来。他们笑个不停，好像他们看的笑话不是她，而是我们。”

languages.text: 「すごくショックを受けるかも、って言ったでしょ？あの人の目、本当に驚いてチカチカしていたわ」{n}イディラの表情から自信が消えて、不安が残った。{/n}「とは言っても、扉の向こうのお友達は落ち着かないね。彼女じゃなくて私達に悪い事が返ってくるみたいに、嘲笑ったりバカ笑いしてるわ」
languages.original_text: "I said it would come as a shock to her, didn't I? Her eyes literally sparkled with astonishment." {n}Idira's smug grin gives way to an expression of concern.{/n} "That said, my friends from behind the door won't calm down. They keep sneering and guffawing as if the joke's on us and not her."

traits.locale_text: 「とてもショックを受ける、と言ったでしょ？あの人の目、本当に驚いてチカチカしていたわ」{n}イディラの表情から自信が消えて、不安が残った。{/n}「とは言っても、扉の向こうのお友達は落ち着かないね。彼女じゃなくて私達に悪い事が返ってくるみたいに、嘲笑ったりバカ笑いしてるわ」

languages.text: «Le había dicho que iba a ser electrizante, ¿no? Estaba que echaba chispas. Literalmente». {n}La sonrisa de satisfacción de Idira da paso a una expresión de preocupación.{/n} «Dicho esto, mis amigos de detrás de la puerta no se van a calmar. Siguen mofándose y riéndose como si la broma fuera para nosotros y no para ella».
languages.original_text: "I said it would come as a shock to her, didn't I? Her eyes literally sparkled with astonishment." {n}Idira's smug grin gives way to an expression of concern.{/n} "That said, my friends from behind the door won't calm down. They keep sneering and guffawing as if the joke's on us and not her."

traits.locale_text: «Le había dicho que iba a ser electrizante, ¿no? Estaba que echaba chispas. Literalmente». {n}La sonrisa de satisfacción de Idira da paso a una expresión de preocupación.{/n} «Dicho esto, mis amigos de detrás de la puerta no se van a calmar. Siguen mofándose y riéndose como si la broma fuera para nosotros y no para ella».

languages.text: "Şaşırıp kalacak dedim mi demedim mi? Gözleri hayretle ışıldadı resmen." {n}İdira'nın ukala sırıtışı, yerini endişeli bir ifadeye bırakıyor.{/n} "Bu bir kenara, kapının ardındaki dostlarım durulmayacak. Sanki şakanın kurbanı o değil de bizmişiz gibi alay edip gülüyorlar."
languages.original_text: "I said it would come as a shock to her, didn't I? Her eyes literally sparkled with astonishment." {n}Idira's smug grin gives way to an expression of concern.{/n} "That said, my friends from behind the door won't calm down. They keep sneering and guffawing as if the joke's on us and not her."

traits.locale_text: "Onu şaşırtacağını söylememiş miydim? Gözleri, hayretle ışıldadı resmen." {n}İdira'nın ukala sırıtışı, yerini endişeye bırakıyor.{/n} "Bu bir kenara... Kapının ardındaki dostlarım sakinleşmiyor. Sanki şakanın kurbanı o değilmiş de bizmişiz gibi alay edip gülüyorlar."
